name: girlsGAN.gif (1)
description:
A day in the silent pre-revolution Russian life of at least 55 cinematic women.

Based on ideas I started exploring in the RED THREAD series (🠖 teia.art/red_thread), I am currently working on an experimental short film using footage from all (to me) available Russian films spanning the years 1908-1918. 

This tiny colourful sequence was selected from the latent space of a short test training made with a data set of 633 stills from 55 films {1908-1917} of instances where only women were present on screen. It was thoroughly (and tiredly, and admiringly, and lazily, and half-asleep, and amused, and excited, and dreamy, and impatiently, and ...) collected using SHIFT+s in the VLC Media Player and diligently (and tiredly, and admiringly, and lazily, and half-asleep, and amused, and excited, and dreamy, and impatiently, and ...) cropped in GIMP.

My film will most probably be in black and white, but I discovered a variety of very beautiful & intense red~orange, blue~grey and gold~yellow (& occasionally a bit of faint green) of which you get a glimpse here.

:: {2022} :: @annaxmalina :: annamalina.com
